org.hps.online.recon

Class EtParallelStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.et.EtConnection
      • org.hps.online.recon.EtParallelStation

  • class EtParallelStation
extends EtConnection
    Create an ET connection for a pool of stations to process reconstruction jobs in parallel.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Logger LOGGER 
      private static int STATION_POSITION 

      • Fields inherited from class org.hps.record.et.EtConnection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EtParallelStation(StationProperties props)
      Create an ET connection from station properties If there is an existing station with the same name, it will be woken up and removed before a new one is created.
